did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Bound photocopies: ca. 312 v.Bound manuscripts: 1 v.Letters: 9 items.Microfilms: 17 linear ft. (366 reels).Unbound photocopies and photographs: 8 linear ft. (6 boxes).Glass slides: 35 slides.Wood blocks: 30 blocks.Metal plates: 10 plates.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Consists mainly of reproductions of manuscripts and some printed material by or about mainly 16th- and 17th-century Italian scientists, amassed and indexed by Howard B. Adelmann.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: American embryologist and historian of science; professor of histology and embryology at Cornell University, 1921-1963.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Consists mainly of reproductions of manuscripts and some printed material by or about mainly 16th- and 17th-century Italian scientists, amassed and indexed by Howard B. Adelmann in the course of his research on the history of anatomy, embryology and histology. Materials focus especially on 17th-century Italian anatomists Marcello Malpighi and Hieronymus Fabricius ab Aquapendente, but also include Giorgio Baglivi, Francesco Redi, Lorenzo Bellini, Donato Rossetti, Henry Oldenburg, Giovanni Domenico Cassini, Johannes Bohn, Vincenzo Busacchi, Giovanni Domenico Guglielmini, Albrecht von Haller, Luigi Ferdinando Marsili, Giambattista Morgagni, Antonio Francesco Ghiselli, Giovanni Alfonso Borelli, and others.

Additional bound photocopies include works by and about Malpighi, and works by Ulisse Aldrovandi, Thomas Bartholin, Lorenzo Bellini, Georges Cuvier, Luigi Ferdinando Marsili, Giambattista Morgagni, Lorenz Oken, Francesco Redi, and others.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Adelmann research materials collection, #4703. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: 112 v. of bound photocopies cataloged separately.
